tender.title: Construction of road from Ulubari LP school to Babulal Boro house via Tarani Boro house, Bhobla Daimary house with 3 nos box culvert approximately 3.5 km at Tanabari under Salbari VCDC, Baksa under CMs Goodwill Mission Project for the year 2023-24. T
